subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Caroline Wozniacki lost to Andrea Petkovic of Germany, 7-5, 3-6, 6-3, in the fourth round at the Sony Ericsson Open in Miami.
snippet: Top-ranked Caroline Wozniacki lost to Andrea Petkovic of Germany, 7-5, 3-6, 6-3, in the fourth round at the Sony Ericsson Open in Miami.
